briefTitle: Molecular Genetic Basis of Invasive Breast Cancer Risk Associated With Lobular Carcinoma in Situ
officialTitle: Molecular Genetic Basis of Invasive Breast Cancer Risk Associated With Lobular Carcinoma in Situ
conditions: Breast Cancer, Lobular Carcinoma, Invasive Breast Cancer
primaryOutcomeMeasure: To perform analyses using microarray-based gene expression profiling to determine whether a unique mRNA and microRNA gene expression profile distinguishes LCIS from normal breast epithelium and from invasive carcinoma.
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* multifocal lobular carcinoma in situ treated with prophylactic mastectomy or lumpectomy
* invasive breast cancer (lobular or ductal) with coexisting lobular carcinoma in situ treated with mastectomy or lumpectomy
* biopsy proven, untreated lobular carcinoma in situ
* invasive lobular cancer with or without coexisting lobular carcinoma in situ treated with mastectomy or lumpectomy

Exclusion Criteria:

* no paraffin blocks available
* no residual lobular carcinoma in situ in paraffin blocks
